people_also_ask.question: Why is Super Metroid so good?
people_also_ask.heading: Super Metroid doesn't waste your time, but it also lets you take your time. It trusts you to figure things out on your own, but only after discreetly teaching you all its tricks. This sense of respect for the player helps make a great game truly one-of-a-kind.24-Aug-2016
people_also_ask.title: Daily Classic: 7 Reasons Super Metroid was an SNES ...

people_also_ask.question: Where can you play Super Metroid?
people_also_ask.heading: Fortunately, “Super Metroid” (1994) remains the best introduction to the series and to the genre, and is readily available on all Nintendo platforms, including the Switch's Super Nintendo app.22-Jun-2021
